reviews.review: Um jogo que parece simples, mas possui sua complexidade. Al√©m do b√°sico, fazer 5 geradores, abrir um ou os dois port√µes, em equipe de quatro sobreviventes e nesse meio tempo, escapar do killer enquanto usa estrat√©gias de persegui√ß√£o, usando as perks que se adequam melhor para a sua jogada e aprendendo a utilizar os mapas da melhor forma poss√≠vel. Ainda estou aprendendo, mesmo com mais de 500 horas de jogo! E, ainda assim, gosto de jogar sempre. Os maiores problemas s√£o os pequenos bugs, que ainda est√£o sempre consertando, e uma parte da comunidade que pode ser bem t√≥xica. Eu, particularmente, n√£o me importo muito, mas isso n√£o deixa de ser desnecess√°rio. Para mim, vale a pena a compra do jogo e das suas DLCs, onde cada killer possui um poder √∫nico, e cada sobrevivente possui tr√™s perks √∫nicas e ensin√°veis aos outros, onde torna o jogo, mesmo assim√©trico, ainda mais interessante a cada partida.

I hate this game so much. The game overall favors controllers over mouse / keyboard. The responsiveness to make turns can sometimes evade killer attacks / cause missed swings on survivors. The community is toxic. The game favors experience players--those who are familiar with the maps. If you know the map well enough, you can loops killers or killers know shortcuts. 

It's also all about working the camera, to see where the other person is, sometimes using slats in the wood walls to catch tiny glimpses. Most maps are dark, so it's hard to see everyone anyway. Claudette blends in too well with the terrain. Also, more maps need to be released. Too many DLCs for cash grabs for this game.

The game is also incredibly buggy. Various visual issues like (i.e.appearing as if you're hooked after getting hit, survivor hair glitching, etc) and connectivity issues (get bounced out of a lobby or appearing in a lobby with friends but not entering a match lobby with friends, continuous errors for miscellaneous reasons that prevent connecting to survivor party, etc).

When boiled down to it's essence, it's not about rewarding players with a fun tag / hide and seek experience, it's about griefing others. Again, I hate this game, I hate the toxic community, and I hate the devs for their laziness.

Since the bible itself had been written, many worshippers of chaos have needed a way to hunt down your friends from all over the globe (for example New Zealand) without getting imprisoned by the hand of the law. Dead by daylight has given us this very ability. Until my days are done i will be murdering my friends with knifes or in the hags case slapping the MCshit outta my so called "friends". Can you honestly say you don't want in on that?

Now is see what you may have to say against that: "but i can kill people in Conan Exiles why would i need to do that in another game?". Well if you said that no, your wrong, in fact your a fucking idiot.

Now i see what you may say in response "no your an idiot!". well i see where you coming from but no your still wrong you little shit.

If you still disagree then i hope someone HEX: Ruin's your life.

Thank you for your time you filthy degenerate.

Now do you have a moment to talk about our lord and saviour: The Entity?

Fun game. Though I think there needs to be more incentive to play killer since I've spent about 10 minutes in the queue for survivor multiple times before giving up and am yet to be bother to wait longer... Though I really enjoy playing Killer so not that big a deal. 

There are lots of mechanics to the game which take a while, and are taking a while, to get used to but it's all part of the learning curve which most games don't have, which isn't necessarily a bad thing since most games once you've played for 30 minutes, you've done all you're ever going to do on it.
yes it's fun despite the overall hate for the meta
this is one of the worst games i have ever played. its actually insanely unfun and i hate this game with every part of myself

I don't even know how to describe this game anymore. It is fun but the problem is that if there is lag the match is so boring because all your knowledge goes out the window and get hit from 10 miles or miss a swing on a guy in front of you because they "aren't actually there". overall pretty ok tho. maybe mid but yeah.
Honestly, if you play survivor solo with randoms, its unbearable. But if you get some friends in OR decide to play killer, you'll have a blast playing this game!
